akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 117–58, div. B, title IV, § 24218(a), Nov. 15, 2021, 135 Stat. 831]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 30306. Repealed. Pub. L. 117–58, div. B, title IV, § 24218(a), Nov. 15, 2021, 135 Stat. 831]
Section, Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 978; Pub. L. 117–286, § 4(a)(308), Dec. 27, 2022, 136 Stat. 4340, related to establishment, duties, and membership of the National Driver Register Advisory Committee.
